channel.title: Status on resticprofile
channel.description: Recent content in Status on resticprofile

item.title: Prometheus
item.description: resticprofile can generate a prometheus file, or send the report to a push gateway. For now, only a backup command will generate a report. Here’s a configuration example with both options to generate a file and send to a push gateway: root: inherit: default prometheus-save-to-file: "root.prom" prometheus-push: "http://localhost:9091/" backup: extended-status: true no-error-on-warning: true source: - / Please note you need to set extended-status to true if you want all the available metrics.
